characterabilities.name: Fire Marshal
characterabilities.description: The ranged weapons of Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Continuous Fire.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Bombs Away
feat.description: While in Madhammer's Control range, friendly Faction models gain +2 RAT. When an enemy model suffers a blast damage roll, or is directly hit by an AOE weapon while in Madhammer's Control range, add an additional die to the damage roll. Bombs Away lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Artillerist (★Action)
execution.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction model gains +2 RAT when making its next AOE ranged attack this turn. If the attack does not directly hit, you can reroll the direction and/or distance of its deviation. Each roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Artillerist.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Carpet Bomb
subabilities.description: After determining the point of impact, roll deviation for two additional 4” AOEs from that point. A model hit by one of the additional AOEs suffer a POW 7 Blast damage roll.

subabilities.name: Case Cracker
subabilities.description: This weapon's base stats become AOE - and POW 7 for this attack. When calculating damage from this attack, halve the base ARM stat of the model directly hit.

subabilities.name: Incendiary
subabilities.description: This attack causes fire damage, and models suffer the Fire continuous effect.

ability.name: Warhead
ability.description: When this model directly hits a model with an attack with this weapon, you can center a 4” AOE on the model directly hit. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer a POW 10 blast damage roll. This damage is not considered to have been caused by an attack. On a critical hit, models in the AOE become knocked down. THis model is not affected by Warhead.

spells.name: Force Field
spells.description: The spellcaster gains Blast Resistance, does not suffer collateral damage, and cannot become knocked down. When an enemy AOE ranged attack deviates from a point in the spellcaster's Control Range, after the deviation distance is rolled you choose the deviation direction. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.name: Ground Zero
spells.description: Center a 5" AOE on the spellcaster. Each other model in the AOE is hit and suffers a POW 13 damage roll. Immediately after this damage is resolved each enemy model damage by Ground Zero is pushed d6" directly away from the spellcaster in the order you choose.

spells.name: Powder Keg
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit lose their initial attacks and cannot make power attacks or special attacks for one round.

spells.name: Primed
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 to melee accuracy and damage rolls but suffers -2 ARM. If an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, center a 3” AOE on it and remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll.

spells.name: Redline
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and +2 to melee attack damage rolls and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Tactician [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Rhulic models can ignore other friendly Rhulic models when determining LOS. Friendly Rhulic models can advance through other friendly Rhulic models in this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

feat.name: Perfect Plan
feat.description: Friendly Rhulic or Searforge Commission models/units currently in Ossrum's Control range gain +3 ARM, +3 SPD, and Pathfinder. Perfect Plan lasts for one round.

execution.name: Resourceful
execution.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Desperate Mission (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. if the model is in range, it gains Last Word. Desperate Mission lasts for one round. (When a model with Last Word is disabled by an enemy attack, it can immediately advance up to 3” and can make one basic Melee attack.)

subabilities.name: Fight to the Last
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Tough for one round.

subabilities.name: Reveille
subabilities.description: Knocked down friendly Faction models in this model's CMD range immediately stand up. Models that became knocked down this turn are not affected by Reveille.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

spells.name: Bullet Dodger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.).

spells.name: Energizer
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its Control Range can immediately advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Fire For Effect
spells.description: Boost the attack and damage rolls of target friendly Faction model's first ranged attack each activation.

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

spells.name: Stranglehold
spells.description: A model damaged by Stranglehold forfeits either its Normal Movement or its Combat Action during it's next activation as its Controller chooses.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup gain Bulldoze. Unstoppable Force lasts for one turn. (When a model with Bulldoze is B2B with an enemy model during its Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2” directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when a model makes a trample power attack.)

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

feat.name: Landslide
feat.description: Choose a table edge and a distance up to 8”. Enemy models currently in Gorten's Control range are pushed the chosen distance directly toward the chosen table edge in the order you choose. For one round, affected models suffer -3 SPD, RAT and DEF, cannot give or receive orders, and cannot charge or make slam or trample power attacks.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Advance Move]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

ability.name: Both Barrels (★Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

ability.name: Critical Smite
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit can be slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

spells.name: Eruption
spells.description: This attack causes fire damage. Place a cloud effect template centered on the model targeted. The template is a hazard that remains in play for one round. A model without Resistance: Fire entering or ending its activation in the AOE suffers the Fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Grind
spells.description: When a warjack is hit by Grind, it suffers 1 damage point to it's first available Movement system box.

spells.name: Rock Wall
spells.description: Place a wall template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. The wall is an obstacle that provides cover.

spells.name: Solid Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range friendly Faction models have Steady, cannot be pushed, and gain Resistance: Blast. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.)(A model with Steady cannot become knocked down.)

spells.name: Strength of Granite
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +4 to its melee attack damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Cygnar and Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Cygnar and Searforge Commission non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Llael.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar, Searforge Commission, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cygnar, Searforge Commission, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Cloud Burst
feat.description: Sparkhammer gains the benefit of all his Arcane Machinery effects this activation. Additionally, while in Sparkhammer's Control range, friendly models can reroll Stormcall accuracy and damage rolls. Each roll can be rerolled only once due to Cloud Burst. Cloud Burst lasts for one turn.

topability.name: Arcane Machinery
topability.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following effects. Arcane Machinery effects last for one round.

subabilities.name: Arcane Calibrations
subabilities.description: Reduce the COST of each spells this model casts this activation by 1 to a minimum of 1.

subabilities.name: Ionization [CTRL]
subabilities.description: When a model without Resistance: Electric suffers an Electric damage roll while within its Control range of this model, add +2 to the roll.

subabilities.name: Power Magnifier (Execution Mode Only)
subabilities.description: This model can spend 1 focus point at any time during its activation to give a 2 focus points to a warjack in its battlegroup that is in her Control range.

subabilities.name: Vexing Alignment
subabilities.description: Increase this model's Control range by 4”.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Stormcall
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore concealment, cover and Stealth.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring this model and models with Resistance: Electric. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

spells.name: Inhospitable Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, enemy models lose and cannot regain Pathfinder for 1 round and treat open terrain as rough terrain. Inhospitable Ground lasts for one round.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.

spells.name: Sunhammer
spells.description: Enemy non-warrior models in a battlegroup that advance more than 1" and end their Normal Movement in the spellcaster's Control Range suffer d3+1 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed.

ability.name: Quake
ability.description: On a direct hit against an enemy model, all models hit are knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Flak Field
characterabilities.description: This model can use Flak Field once per turn at any time during its activation. When this model uses Flak Field, models B2B with it suffer an unboostable POW 12 blast damage roll and other models within 2” of it suffer an unboostable POW 6 blast damage roll. This model is not affected by Flak Field.

characterabilities.name: Follow Up
characterabilities.description: When this model slams an enemy model, immediately after the slam is resolved this model can advance directly toward the slammed model, up to the distance the slammed model was moved.

characterabilities.name: Slammer
characterabilities.description: This model can make slam power attacks without using focus or being forced. Models slammed by this model are moved an additional 2”.

ability.name: Sustained Attack
ability.description: During this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

models.title: Mercenary Searforge Commission Vengeance of Dhunia Solo

characterabilities.name: Client
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, choose one friendly warcaster, warlock, solo, or unit commander to be the Bokur's client. This model cannot be the client of another Bokur or have the same client as another Bokur. If its client leaves play, the Bokur loses all client benefits even if the client is replaced by another model. While within 6" of its client this model gains +2 to attack and damage rolls. If this model's client has Advance Deployment, this model gains Advance Deployment.

characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.
